channel.title: GE interface help!

item.title: GE interface help!
item.dc:creator: @imsuperman05 imsuperman05
item.description:
@imsuperman05 wrote:

I’m trying to add the GE Interface for a PI 317 loading 474.
I’m not good at client-sided stuff.

This is my method atm, just been throwing shit in…

public static void GEScreen(TextDrawingArea[] wid) { //RSInterface.addScreenInterface(1800); RSInterface Interface = RSInterface.interfaceCache[1800]; addSprite(1801, 1, "GE/Selling/Selling Screen"); }
the .png files are located in Sprites/GE/ Selling and Buying

Read full topic
